reuters.title: CB AND T BANCSHARES INC <CBTB> 1ST QTR NET
reuters.body: Shr 27 cts vs 24 cts Net 5,223,000 vs 4,682,000 Avg shrs 19.7 mln vs 19.4 mln NOTE: Results reflected pooled acquisition of First Community Bancshares Inc on March 31, 1987 and include Camden Bancorp from January 31, 1987 purchase. Reuter 
